page.title: 14OUR SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: ST.ABBS SCHOOL IS A RURAL SCHOOL.IT IS SMALL WITH ONLY 19 PUPILS AND ONE PERMANENT TEACHER. THE PUPILS RANGE IN AGE FROM 4 TO 10 YEARS AND ARE PLACED IN LOOSE CLASS GROUPINGS OF PRIMARIES 1 TO 5. TO COMPLETE THE LAST TWO YEARS OF THEIR PRIMARY EDUCATION, THE CHILDREN ATTEND EITHER EYEMOUTH OR COLDINGHAM PRIMARY SCHOOLS. THE CHILDREN WORK IN A LARGE CLASSROOM,WHICH IS SUBDIVIDED INTO A WORK AREA, A BOOK AND READING AREA AND AN ART AND CRAFT AREA.THERE IS A SEPARATE DINING ROOM WHICH ALSO SERVES AS A MUSIC ROOM. THE VILLAGE HALL IS USED FOR P.E. A PLAYING FIELD IS SITUATED NEXT TO THE SCHOOL AND IS USED FOR GAMES AND SPORTS. A SMALL GARDEN WAS CREATED TWO YEARS AGO AND IS USED FOR ENVIRONMENTAL ST.
